website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Charged 24/7 NM is a modern sneaker with a classic look that has earned many an owner a compliment. Its structured design hides highly functional features that include superior shock absorption, breathability, durability, and cushioning.The shoe’s full-length non-marking sole provides great traction on many surfaces while the light padding on the insole makes the shoe perfect for all-day wear. The only complaints against the sneaker are that it is smaller than standard sizing and provides very little in the way of arch support.
pros: According to a good number of Under Armour Charged 24/7 NM users, the shoe is quite comfortable with a very soft suede material
The design was the second most praised feature of the low-top shoe
Several reviewers described the footwear as “very cute” while others mentioned how many compliments they got for their choice of kick
Some individuals praised the quality of the lifestyle shoe, describing it as “very well-made.” They also mentioned that the footwear held up well even during a blizzard
A few delighted testers remarked that the Under Armour Charged 24/7 NM provided a perfect fit width-wise
Two persons reported that the low-top Under Armour sneaker was “absolutely worth the money.”
One customer noted how breathable the casual low-top footwear is
A consumer liked how lightweight the Charged 24/7 NM is
cons: A lot of buyers reported that the Under Armour Charged 24/7 NM runs small
A couple of purchasers complained that the lifestyle sneaker had no arch support

customer_reviews.title: 5 because that's pretty much the size I am in every shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7.5 because that's pretty much the size I am in every shoe. They fit a bit small, however I was on my feet all day when I tried them on. I ordered an 8 to try on and compare and then I will return one. I love these shoes. Super cute and very light weight and I love the color. Great shoe and I don't think there will need to be any "break-in" time because they are that comfortable! :-) My arches are not high, they are more on the lower side. This is my first pair of Under Armour and I am impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Over-all good shoe but the backs of the heels are so ...
customer_reviews.text: Over-all good shoe but the backs of the heels are so stiff. They will bruise and rub your heel raw if you don't have something to pad it. I would recommend using a the hot air from a blowdryer to work on stretching the heel away from you to help break it in faster.
customer_reviews.author: Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Not running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are not running shoes. They are cute and comfy enough but they are not running shoes. You do not get the support necessary needed for running, especially if you’re an outdoor runner. They are cute and I still wear them but made the mistake of wearing them on a run at first and I ended up triggering my runner’s knee pain so yeah.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Just the pair of shoes I wanted and I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Just the pair of shoes I wanted and I am enjoying wearing them and receiving all sorts of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N Miller

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small.
customer_reviews.text: Runs really small. Definitely order up. Very cute shoe but had to return way too small.
customer_reviews.author: secg

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the recommended size based on Under Armour's website but these do fit snug. The padding on the sole is nice and comfortable to walk in but the edge of the shoe around the ankle is rough against the skin. Hopefully will soften once broken in more. Just order a half size up and these are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I receive a compliment every time I wear them. I bought them because I'm tired of paying an arm and a leg for my favorite tennis shoes. These are my new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Loved the style but literally NO arch support. I assumed being an athletic shoe it would have some support. Sent them back, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Annamarie Macareno

customer_reviews.title: These shoes turned out to be the most comfortable shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: These shoes turned out to be the most comfortable shoes I own. They are so soft on your feet. They feel like I have slippers on and are practice for working out at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: lauren ibric

customer_reviews.title: Size up.
customer_reviews.text: Fits a tad bigger. I’m glad I read the reviews. Normally a size 9..ordered a 9.5 and they fit perfect. Really nice. Very happy with them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful sneaker. My FAV so far!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! Keep in mind there is NO arch support. And they tend to run SMALL. I WEAR 8.5 in Nike & had to return these & order a 9. The 9 fits comfortably! The blue is sharp looking! I'll buy the grey next...
customer_reviews.author: L. Heady

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Amazon asked about my shoe size and made a size recommendation. The shoes came and were too small, length & width. I've reordered a size bigger and hope these fit. The style is nice
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Davenport

customer_reviews.title: 5 because i like my shoes to fit a little loose and these ...
customer_reviews.text: My size is 9. I ordered a size 9.5 because I like my shoes to fit a little loose and these fit to be exact with no extra room .
customer_reviews.author: Ru Chen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not good support but are cute and reasonable for the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great casual shoe for walking, not much support for running - nice clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: In love !! They do fit a bit tight at first but after a couple days they are perfect. I would order a 1/2 size bigger than your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were too small and were not what I expected from the reviews and pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: I like how the shoes look
customer_reviews.text: I like how the shoes look, I just wish they cane in a wide. Overall I’ll still wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cute and decently comfortable. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Libby Knapple

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoe .. wife loves them.. very comfy she says
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Modern!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are AMAZING! For only $20 I was shocked to find such comfort and ease in a pair shoes like this. I've never worn Under Armor before but after reading the reviews I ordered my normal shoe size and they fit perfectly! I love the look of these with the bit of suede on the front of the shoe. Very stylish and modern! The color is exactly what I expected. Couldn't be happier overall!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but run a little small. I ordered up.
customer_reviews.author: yellowdog8

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: size 6 was too small. can't request for size change
customer_reviews.author: mafiusa

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Charged 24/7 Low Nm Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Lightweight textile upper with specially designed mesh toe for breathability and support. Easily adjustable lacing system ensures the perfect fit. Die-cut EVA insole throughout for added comfort. The Charged Cushioning midsole absorbs shock and transforms it into a responsive force plate. Full-length, abrasion-resistant rubber outsole for increased durability and traction. High abrasion rubber added to heavy wear points under the heel. Non-removable insole.
feature_bullets: Embossed textured suede upper provides comfort, texture and a classic look
Easily adjustable lacing system for perfect fit
Die-Cut, full-length EVA insole for added comfort
The Charged Cushioning midsole absorbs shock and transforms it into a responsive force plate.
Full-length abrasion resistant rubber outsole for increased durability and traction
